cui_name: Severe Combined Immunodeficiency, Autosomal Recessive, T Cell Negative, B Cell Positive, NK Cell Positive
reasoning: Highly specific SCID subtype with defined genotype (autosomal recessive, specific cytokine signaling defect). Estimated at ~8-10% of all SCID cases based on genetic epidemiology studies, approximately 0.08 per 100k births.
source: Immunodeficiency disease registries and genetic studies
